item.title: Reproducible Bar Crawl
item.description: Preliminaries Get the Maps Must visit: Should visit: Late night: I wanted to do two things: Learn a bit of blogdown Write up a list of amazing places for Auriel Fournier to checkout when she visits East Lansing, Michigan and the incomparable Michigan State University. Go Green! Behold, the Reproducible Bar Crawl in all its pedantry. Preliminaries Letâ€™s load the packages we will need for our post.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
